channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: JustiGuide wants to use AI to help people navigate the U.S. immigration system
item.description: The startup uses AI to help immigrants understand the system, connect with lawyers and reduce associated costs.

item.title: There’s an AI Industry Civil War Brewing in D.C.
item.description: A tale of two AI super PACs.

item.title: Norton's Black Friday VPN deals have arrived with prices slashed across plans
item.description: Plans start from only $2.08 per month for Norton's excellent VPN, with Black Friday prices set to run until December 2.

item.title: Top Linux PC maker drops plan for SnapdragonX Elite-powered notebook - says hardware was "less suitable than expected."
item.description: Tuxedo cancels Snapdragon X Elite Linux notebook after technical hurdles, planning to monitor Snapdragon X2 Elite for potential future development.

item.title: Plus de trafic aérien = plus d’argent ? Une étude européenne casse le récit dominant
item.description: Est-ce la hausse du niveau de vie qui conduit les gens à prendre davantage l’avion ou est-ce l’augmentation du trafic qui apporte de nouvelles opportunités économiques ? Le think-tank New Economics Foundation et l’ONG Transport & Environment (T&E) se sont penchés sur la question et la réponse...

item.title: OpenAI claims teen circumvented safety features before suicide that ChatGPT helped plan
item.description: OpenAI claims that the 16-year-old violated ChatGPT's terms of use.

item.title: The US Military Wants to Fix Its Own Equipment. Defense Contractors Are Trying to Shoot That Down
item.description: A push by military contractors could alter pending legislation that would have empowered servicemembers to repair equipment. Lobbyists are pitching a subscription service instead.

item.title: Redwood Materials reportedly cuts 5% of staff after $350M raise
item.description: The battery recycling and cathode production company, founded by former Tesla CTO JB Straubel, has started using recycled battery materials to create energy storage solutions for AI data centers.

item.title: Pentagon contractors want to blow up military right to repair
item.description: Military contractors are trying to thwart a widely-supported right-to-repair provision in the annual defense policy bill — and their efforts may pay off. A source familiar with the negotiations tells The Verge that there are significant concerns that the bill’s right-to-repair language will be replaced by a “data-as-a-service” model, potentially requiring the Department of Defense […]...

item.title: U.S. Bank Calls Ability to Freeze Stablecoins ‘Appealing’ as Crypto Has Completely Lost the Plot
item.description: Dark days for the bros.

item.title: Sony Pulse Elite : l’un des meilleurs casques PS5 a droit à une belle réduction pour le Black Friday
item.description: Vous voulez entendre chaque pas ennemi dans Call of Duty ? Le Pulse Elite et ses transducteurs planaires sont en promo. Une technologie rare à ce prix qui change tout.

item.title: Jeff Bezos' New AI Venture Quietly Acquired an Agentic Computing Startup
item.description: Project Prometheus has raised over $6 billion in funding and hired over 100 employees, a handful of whom joined through its acquisition of General Agents, according to records and sources.

item.title: J’adore cette guirlande connectée, et son prix pour le Black Friday aussi
item.description: Votre sapin mérite mieux qu'une guirlande qui clignote bêtement. Pour le Black Friday, la référence absolue de l'éclairage connecté devient enfin abordable, et c'est le moment de craquer.

item.title: Retour sur la Lune : la Nasa doit faire des choix urgents avant qu’il ne soit trop tard
item.description: Dans un contexte de la course à la Lune, le président Trump a demandé au directeur par intérim de la Nasa d'assurer l'arrivée des États-Unis sur notre satellite avant celle des Chinois. Pourtant, malgré des ambitions affichées, SpaceX pourrait ne pas être prêt avant la fin de cette décennie,...

item.title: Here are 50+ deals I'd buy from Best Buy's Black Friday sale – up to $1,300 off Apple, Sony, Ninja, LG, and more
item.description: I've been tracking the Best Buy Black Friday sale all month, and now I'm here to bring you all of the very best deals from the retailer's big end-of-year event.

item.title: Russell T Davies Says He’s Got the Grand Return of ‘Doctor Who’ Already Figured Out
item.description: Now that the BBC has confirmed the show's not-so-immediate future, the series' current showrunner is already making moves.

item.title: Voici les 25 meilleures offres du Black Friday, tout simplement
item.description: Le Black Friday commence officiellement ce vendredi 28 novembre, mais la plupart des marchands comme Amazon, Fnac, Darty ou encore Boulanger, ont déjà partagé la plupart de leurs offres. Nous vous avons alors préparé un petit florilège des meilleures promotions disponibles actuellement.

item.title: Annoyed by a ‘New York Times’ headline? It seems like that’s increasingly the Gray Lady’s goal
item.description: Several ‘New York Times’ headlines in 2025 have earned severe social media backlash. Is it happening on purpose? The job of a headline is to draw attention to the article beneath it. When a headline instead draws attention to itself, it feels as wrong as a carnival barker cursing out passersby.

item.title: ChatGPT: Everything you need to know about the AI-powered chatbot
item.description: A timeline of ChatGPT product updates and releases, starting with the latest, which we’ve been updating throughout the year.

item.title: 15 high-cost drugs, including Ozempic, get major Medicare price reductions in latest negotiation round
item.description: The cuts stem from the Inflation Reduction Act, not Trump’s “most favored nation” approach, and apply to what Medicare pays drugmakers. A wave of vital prescription drugs is about to get a lot cheaper for people on Medicare.

item.title: A comprehensive list of 2025 tech layoffs
item.description: A complete list of all the known layoffs in tech, from Big Tech to startups, broken down by month throughout 2024.

item.title: Multiple London councils report disruption amid ongoing cyberattack
item.description: Three London councils reported disruption, prompting officials to shut down phone lines and networks and activate emergency plans.

item.title: Cet aspirateur robot ultra-haut de gamme Dreame est dans notre top 3 et il est à -35 % pendant le Black Friday
item.description: Hautement puissant, doté d'une serpillière à rouleau toujours propre et bourré de technologies, le Dreame Aqua10 Ultra Roller Complete a clairement mérité sa place parmi nos aspirateurs robots préférés du moment. Pendant la Black Friday Week, on le trouve à 979 euros au lieu de 1 499 euros chez Boulanger.

item.title: OpenAI Is Just $200 Billion Away From Still Losing Money, HSBC Says
item.description: Just one more funding round, bro, I swear just one more funding round will fix it.

item.title: Amazon Workers Issue Warning About Company’s ‘All-Costs-Justified’ Approach to AI Development
item.description: Amazon Employees for Climate Justice says that over 1,000 workers have signed a petition raising “serious concerns” about the company’s “aggressive rollout” of artificial intelligence tools.

item.title: The Philips Hue Signe Floor Lamp is $131 off at Amazon – don't let this deal fade away
item.description: This vivid, wall-washing smart floor lamp from Philips Hue is on sale at a significant discount this Black Friday.

item.title: New Study Rewrites the Story of Easter Island’s Mysterious Stone Heads
item.description: Researchers used drone imagery to construct a 3D model of Rapa Nui's main moai quarry and reveal its secrets.

item.title: The end of Stranger Things: all the news from the Netflix show’s fifth and final season
item.description: A decade after it first premiered, Netflix’s most impactful show is coming to an end. The fifth and final season of Stranger Things is being split apart into a three-part event that spans multiple holidays: it premieres on November 26th, with a second batch of episodes on Christmas, followed by the final episode on December […]

item.title: Battlefield 6 is already 24 percent off for Black Friday
item.description: Electronic Arts’ Battlefield 6 is still relatively hot off the presses, having just launched in October. But thanks to Black Friday, you can pick up a copy on the PlayStation 5 for just $52.99 ($17 off) at Amazon. The price has also dropped at Best Buy to $59.99 ($10 off) for PS5 and Xbox Series […]

item.title: The case for not loving your job
item.description: There’s potential danger in placing too much importance on your career, research shows. Discussions around the role of work in our lives are frequently divided into two camps. “Do what you love and you’ll never work a day in your life”, one side proclaims. The other: “A job just needs to pay the bills.”

item.title: I spent a week playing with the RedMagic 11 Pro - it brings liquid refreshment to gaming phones
item.description: The RedMagic 11 Pro gives you class-leading gaming performance and features at a mid-market price, so long as you’re prepared to live with a few rough edges.

item.title: GM tech executive shakeup continues on software team
item.description: Three of GM's top software executives have left the automaker in recent months, as the company moves to combine its disparate technology businesses.
